notes: Bank selection is completed using both Bank Select MSB and LSB followed by Program Change
Used with CC 0 for full 14-bit bank selection
Used with CC 1 for high-resolution control
Bank selection is completed using both Bank Select MSB and LSB followed by Program Change
Used with CC 0 for full 14-bit bank selection
Used with CC 1 for high-resolution control
Higher values = slower glide between notes
Used with CC 6 for high-resolution parameter control
Main volume control for the channel
Used with CC 7 for high-resolution volume control
Commonly used for chorus send level
Specifies the source note for portamento
Selects LSB of NRPN parameter to be edited
Selects MSB of NRPN parameter to be edited
Selects LSB of RPN parameter to be edited
Selects MSB of RPN parameter to be edited

parameter_description: Controls pitch bend range in semitones
notes: Set by RPN 0 0 then Data Entry MSB
usage: 0 = no bend effect typical value is 2 semitones

parameter_description: Fine control of channel tuning in cents
notes: Set by RPN 0 1 then Data Entry MSB/LSB Center is 8192 (64/0) range is +/- 100 cents

parameter_description: Coarse control of channel tuning in semitones
notes: Set by RPN 0 2 then Data Entry MSB Center is 64 range is +/- 64 semitones
Set by RPN 0 3 then Data Entry MSB
Set by RPN 0 4 then Data Entry MSB

usage: Disables data entry controls until new RPN/NRPN selected

parameter_description: Resets all controllers to default values
notes: Returns all controllers to default state

parameter_description: Enables/disables local control of sound generator

notes: Sends Note Off for all notes

parameter_description: Disables Omni mode (responds only to specified channel)
Enables Omni mode (responds to all channels)

notes: Turns off poly mode and all notes. Value = # of channels or 0 for omni
Turns off mono mode and all notes
F0 7E <device ID> 01 <sample format> <sample period> <sample length MSB> <sample length> <sample length LSB> <sustain loop start point MSB> <...> <sustain loop end point LSB> <loop type> F7
usage: Used to begin a sample dump

parameter_description: Requests sample data from a device

usage: Various MTC functions based on sub-ID 2
Bulk Dump Request (00) Bulk Dump Reply (01)
Controls lighting sound machinery for shows
velocity Note off messages (can also use Note On with zero velocity)
velocity Note on messages (velocity 0 = Note Off)

notes: Status byte: An (n=channel) Data: note number pressure value
Status byte: Bn (n=channel) Data: controller number value
usage: Standard control change messages (see CC list above)

notes: Status byte: Cn (n=channel) Data: program number
Status byte: Dn (n=channel) Data: pressure value
Status byte: En (n=channel) Data: LSB MSB
Status byte: F0 End byte: F7
Status byte: F1 Data: time code data
usage: Quarter frame of SMPTE time code

notes: Status byte: F2 Data: LSB MSB
usage: 14-bit position in MIDI beats (1 beat = 6 MIDI clocks)

notes: Status byte: F3 Data: song number
Status byte: F6 No data bytes
usage: Requests analog synthesizers to tune oscillators

notes: Status byte: F8 No data bytes
usage: 24 clocks per quarter note for synchronization

notes: Status byte: FA No data bytes
Status byte: FB No data bytes
usage: Continue playing sequence from current position

notes: Status byte: FC No data bytes
Status byte: FE No data bytes
usage: Sent every 300ms to confirm connection is active

notes: Status byte: FF No data bytes
usage: Reset all devices to power-up condition
